index.description: The identifier, in the case of v-for, can be indexed
index.description_zh: 标识符，如果是v-for，可用index索引

autoClose.description: Whether or not to automatically close other groups of swipe buttons
autoClose.description_zh: 是否自动关闭其他swipe按钮组

threshold.description: The sliding distance threshold, only if it is greater than this value, is considered to open the menu
threshold.description_zh: 滑动距离阈值，只有大于此值，才被认为是要打开菜单

:options.description: The content of the button on the right

name.description: The identifier, in the case of v-for, can be indexed
name.description_zh: 标识符，如果是v-for，可用index索引值

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the button is clicked
events.params: name: props参数name的值，index: 第几个按钮被点击
